messages.subject: Help for a dog????
messages.msgSnippet: I got this from another list and was wondering if anyone out there could help this guy.  I have NO clue, but thought some of you might. Pax, Crys
messages.messageBody:
I got this from another list and was wondering if anyone out there
could help this guy. I have NO clue, but thought some of you
might.

Pax,
Crys

<><><><><>

From: "Randi Long" <angel2spirit@...>
To: ANaturalSolution@onelist.com
Date sent: Tue, 16 Nov 1999 17:30:15 MST
Send reply to: ANaturalSolution@onelist.com
Subject: [ANaturalSolution] Help for a dog????

[ Double-click this line for list subscription options ]

From: "Randi Long" <angel2spirit@...>

I haven't even introduced myself.... and I don't really know if this is
the
right list to ask this question.... =) So please don't be angry with
me if
its not.....
I have a dog that is having seizures.... not very often though. The
last
one was over 2 months ago and very short. He just had one, and it
lasted
for like 2-3 minutes.... is there anything anyone can suggest???
Herbs,
oils????
Thanks,
Randi ^i^
